c. Business Risk ----------- iii. Threaten the project plan. 

 

Which of the following statements is correct:
1. Project risk threatens the project plan.
2. Technical risk threatens the quality and timeliness of the software to be produced.
3. Business risk threatens the viability of the software to be built.

a.option: a - iii, b - ii, c - i
a - ii, b - iii, c - i
a - iii, b - i, c - ii
a - i, b - ii, c - iii

Which of the following statements differentiates between load testing and stress testing:

  1. Load testing is used to identify all possible performance bugs, while stress testing is used to identify issues related to speed, such as latency, response time, etc.

  3. Stress testing is a subset of performance testing that includes volume testing, while load testing has a very wide scope that includes spike testing.
  4. Load testing is used to test the system under normal workload conditions, while stress testing is used to test the system under extreme conditions.

Consider the following JSON  code snippet which contains a book description:

{
	"id": 0,
	"book": "Postman",
	"no_of_pages": 542,
	"is_exist": true
}

Which of the following postman code snippets will give the output as  "PASS"?

a.option:
var jsonData = JSON(responseBody);
tests["Checking no_of_pages parameter from JSON data"] = jsonData.no_of_pages === 542;

var jsonData = JSON.parse(responseBody);
tests["Checking book parameter from JSON data"] = jsonData === "Postman";

var jsonData = JSON.parse(responseBody);
tests["Example of failed test"] = jsonData.cover_color === “Red”;
